name: golemio-integration-engine
description: Integration Engine of the Golemio data platform.

scripts.test: mocha --check-leaks --timeout 120000 -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config test/core/helpers/*.test.ts test/core/helpers/**/*.test.ts test/core/**/*.test.ts test/modules/**/*.test.ts --exclude test/datasources-test/*.{ts,js,txt} --exit
scripts.test-debug: mocha --inspect-brk=9230 --check-leaks --timeout 120000 -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config test/core/helpers/*.test.ts test/core/helpers/**/*.test.ts test/core/**/*.test.ts test/modules/**/*.test.ts --exclude test/datasources-test/*.{ts,js,txt} --exit
scripts.code-coverage: nyc mocha --timeout 120000 -r ts-node/register -r source-map-support/register -r dotenv/config test/core/helpers/*.test.ts test/core/helpers/**/*.test.ts test/core/**/*.test.ts test/modules/**/*.test.ts --exclude test/datasources-test/*.{ts,js,txt} --exit
scripts.datasources-test-report: mocha --check-leaks --timeout 120000 -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config test/datasources-test/DataSourcesAvailabilityChecking.test.ts --exit > test/datasources-test/report.txt ; node -r dotenv/config test/datasources-test/reportErrorsByEmail.js
scripts.generate-docs: npx typedoc --readme "./README.MD" --name "Golemio Integration Engine" --mode file --out docs/typedoc src

author: Operator ICT, a.s.
